name: @crvouga/result
description: A comprehensive Result type library for TypeScript with Ok, Err, Loading, and NotAsked states

scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run build && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run build && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:preview: npm version prerelease --preid=beta && npm run build && npm publish --tag beta && git push && git push --tags
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run lint && npm test
